q_en: List the progress percentage of all sewing groups
gt:
Sure thing! Here's the progress percentage for all the sewing groups. Let's see how they're doing! üßµ‚ú®

| Sewing Group      | Progress Percentage (%) |
|-------------------|--------------------------|
| Master Sewers     | 97.44                    |
| Skilled Sewers    | 97.22                    |
| Advanced Sewers   | 81.96                    |
| Premier Sewers    | 74.67                    |
| Elite Sewers      | 44.07                    |

Keep up the great work, everyone! üéâ

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM working_group WHERE type = 'sew';
steps.description: Retrieve all sewing group IDs and names

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) / SUM(planned_number) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '2' GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: For each sewing group, calculate the progress percentage by dividing the total completed number by the total planned number for all sewing tasks assigned to the group

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) / SUM(planned_number) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '7' GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: For each sewing group, calculate the progress percentage by dividing the total completed number by the total planned number for all sewing tasks assigned to the group

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) / SUM(planned_number) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '8' GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: For each sewing group, calculate the progress percentage by dividing the total completed number by the total planned number for all sewing tasks assigned to the group

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) / SUM(planned_number) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '9' GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: For each sewing group, calculate the progress percentage by dividing the total completed number by the total planned number for all sewing tasks assigned to the group

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) / SUM(planned_number) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '10' GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: For each sewing group, calculate the progress percentage by dividing the total completed number by the total planned number for all sewing tasks assigned to the group

steps.sql: SELECT wg.name, (SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(st.planned_number)) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE wg.type = 'sew' GROUP BY wg.id;
steps.description: Combine the results to list the progress percentage of all sewing groups
